*Data through 30 Aug 2020*
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
books <- read_csv("data/goodreads_library_export_20200830.csv",
                  col_types = cols(`Date Read`=col_date(format="%Y/%m/%d"),
                                   `Date Added`=col_date(format="%Y/%m/%d")))
```

## Highest Rated Books

The 10 highest rated unread books in my library:

```{r}
books %>%
      filter(`Exclusive Shelf`=="to-read") %>%
      select(Title, Author, `Average Rating`) %>%
      arrange(desc(`Average Rating`)) %>%
      slice_head(n=10) %>%
      kable()
```
